//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
// 
// Sample Name: Envmap
// 
// Copyright (c) 1999 Microsoft Corporation. All rights reserved.
// 
//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------


Description
===========
  The Envmap sample demonstrates cubic environment mapping.  It displays a
  reflective sphere inside of a cube. 

Path
====
  Source: Mssdk\Samples\Multimedia\D3dx\Src\Envmap

  Executable: Mssdk\Samples\Multimedia\D3dx\Bin

Programming Notes
=================
  This sample was built using the D3DX utility library.
